titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 4365) to amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to children's health.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-901, by Ms. Pryce (OH).
Rule provides for consideration of Senate amendment to H.R. 4365 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 285.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 594.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/26/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of the Senate amendment to H.R. 4365 (children's health).
